name: ZingZest World
note: This is an E-commerce website.Where the user can browse through various category products from this website.Those products come from a website ZingZest Seller.If you want be come a seller can go to the seller website from our website.
features: User can search any kind of products in out search section.
The product details page will show all information of each product.
There are a filter options where you can filter product by their name, type etc..
It has JWT authorization system so that if someone get your backed link, they can't access your account and can't see your items
Users can add their favorite items is cart section
It has sort options for users so they can easily find out the prices of products
I set dynamically review section where a products get reviews when users give that product review
